## Feature class

Feature instances define an area of functionality of an app. Each has a unique string ID, and may expose a public API containing services and slots. It also contains a list of all dependencies, meaning other Feature instances, to use their APIs.

When calling `runEngineApp` and providing it with a Feature\[\], it uses the definitions to initialize a `RuntimeFeature` for each.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Feature<ID extends string = string, Deps extends Dependency[] = any[], API extends EntityRecord = any, EnvironmentContext extends Record<string, DisposableContext<any>> = any>
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                  | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(def)](./engine-core.feature._constructor_.md) |           | <p>Define a new feature by providing: - Unique string identifier - API - Dependencies (optional) - Context (optional)</p><p>This instance will be detected by engine when exported as default, as well as being used by <code>&lt;feature-name&gt;.&lt;environment-name&gt;.env.ts</code> files to define the environment specific implementations.</p> |

## Properties

| Property                                              | Modifiers | Type                                                                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ----------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [api](./engine-core.feature.api.md)                   |           | API                                                                                  | Engine entities (Slot, Service, etc.) this Feature exposes to other Features depending on it. This is a record with the key being the name of the api and the value being the definition.                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [asDependency](./engine-core.feature.asdependency.md) |           | [Dependency](./engine-core.dependency.md)<!-- -->&lt;ID, API, EnvironmentContext&gt; | <p>References <code>this</code> without the exact types of <code>Deps</code> (making them a generic <code>Feature[]</code>). We use <code>someFeature.asEntity</code> instead of <code>someFeature</code> when we want to avoid typescript inlining these types during inference of <code>.d.ts</code> files.</p><p>Mainly used where a Feature has dependencies:</p> |

```ts
new Feature({
   id: 'someFeature',
   dependencies: [anotherFeature.asDependency],
   api: { ... },
})
```

|
| [context](./engine-core.feature.context.md) | | EnvironmentContext | Environment-specific APIs consumed by this feature |
| [dependencies](./engine-core.feature.dependencies.md) | | Deps | <code>Feature[]</code> this Feature depends on and can consume their API |
| [id](./engine-core.feature.id.md) | | ID | Unique string that identifies the feature. |
